title: New: GIANTS – Falling Feat. Wølffe
content:
Really enjoyed London duo GIANTS and their two debut track, featuring YADi and Keith Murray, unfortunately their third offering, the Josef Salvat featuring Throwback, dropped just as I was in full on dissertation mode. Anyway, glad I caught their fourth track, this time calling in the recently Neon Gold featured Wølffe for an elegant pop masterclass. Check out Falling below.

Follow our Spotify On Repeat playlist for a hand-picked selection of the current hottest tracks.
author: 5e9b68b27a1236eccfeb1d27
